docs.text: Performance Curves Rationale Getting Started Development This project uses tox to run tests and perform basic code management. Using a python 3 environment, install tox using the following command. pip install tox Running Tests To run the unit test suite for the package, invoke tox using the following command. You can change the minor version of Python using the one of the variants. tox -e test-py36 # or test-py37 or test-py38
docs.title: Home

docs.text: This is a test of MkDocs API Write me. foo ( i , s ) A simple function Parameters: Name Type Description Default i int Some number required s str Some test required Returns: Type Description List[str] A list of s with i elements. Source code in performance_curves/__init__.py def foo ( i : int , s : str ) -> List [ str ]: """A simple function Arguments: i: Some number s: Some test Return: A list of `s` with `i` elements. """ return [ s ] * i
